name: homndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chom, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4))
-| wceq(chom, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat4)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (Hom ` ndx)= cdc(1, 4)
⊣ Hom = Slot(cdc(1, 4))
⊣ cdc(1, 4)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chom, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4))
-| wceq(chom, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat4)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Hom ` ndx)= cdc(1, 4)
⊣ Hom = Slot(cdc(1, 4))
⊣ cdc(1, 4)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chom, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat4), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat4, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chom, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat4, cn)

|- wceq(cfv(chom, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4))
-| wcel(nat4, cn)
